PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08222020-10-21,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActInquiries Act
SubjectJoint Public Inquiry into the Nova Scotia April 2020 Tragedy
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION do issue, for the period ending on December 15, 2022, under the Great Seal of Canada appointing three Commissioners to conduct an inquiry under the name of the JOINT PUBLIC INQUIRY INTO THE NOVA SCOTIA APRIL 2020 TRAGEDY.
AttachmentsAttachment
